data.name: A1
data.value: Is there anything else I can help you with?

data.value: Find a store

data.name: B1_1
data.value: Provide your order number

data.value: Order Number

data.name: B3
data.value: Returns and exchanges

data.name: C1
data.value: Which type of account may I assist you with? A) New credit account B) Existing credit account

data.name: C2
data.value: If you’d like to apply for a credit account, visit m.lowes.com/credit. If you’ve already applied, you’ll be notified of your status within 4 – 10 business days.

data.name: C3
data.value: For more information, please call Synchrony Bank at 1-800-444- 1408.

data.name: C4
data.value: To manage your account or pay a bill, visit m.lowes.com/credit. You may also pay your bill at a Lowe’s store or by calling Synchrony Bank at 1-800-444-1408.

data.name: D1
data.value: Please confirm your phone number so we can lookup your customer record and help you. Don’t worry — we won’t contact you with promotional texts or calls.

data.name: D2
data.value: What's your ZIP code? We'll find a Lowe's near you.

data.name: E1
data.value: Thanks. Just a moment while I send your information over to a Lowe’s associate.

data.name: E1*
data.value: OK, I’ve passed your information along and an associate will be in touch at their next availability.

data.name: E10
data.value: Looks like you sent another photo — thanks. That's all for now. I'll pass this along so your associate has everything they need to assist you.

data.name: E11
data.value: Looks like you sent another photo — thanks. That's all for now. I'll pass this along so your repair associate has everything they need to assist you.

data.name: E12
data.value: No problem. Just a heads up, I may not be able to connect you with the same associate.

data.name: E13
data.value: OK. I'm passing your information along to an associate. Just a heads up, I may not be able to connect you with the same person as before.

data.name: E14
data.value: It's been nice chatting with you. Goodbye for now.

data.name: E15
data.value: Also, we want to give you our full attention and we're currently helping other customers, so we'll be back with you as soon as possible.

data.name: E16
data.value: This session is now closed.

data.name: E17
data.value: OK, no problem. Take care!

data.name: E2
data.value: Thanks for chatting.

data.name: E3
data.value: Thanks. I'm sending your information to a Lowe's repair associate to review, and they'll be in touch at their next availability.

data.name: E4
data.value: Great, that's all for now. I'll pass this information along so your associate has the details they need to help you with your repair or warranty.

data.name: E5
data.value: Great, that's all for now. I'll pass this information along so your associate has the details they need to help you with your order.

data.name: E6
data.value: Great, that's all for now. I'll pass this information along so your associate has the details they need to help you.

data.name: E7
data.value: No problem, I'll pass your information along to an associate.

data.name: E8
data.value: Looks like you sent a photo — thanks. I'll pass this along so your associate has everything they need to assist you.

data.name: E9
data.value: Looks like you sent another photo — thanks. I'll pass this along so your associate has everything they need to assist you.

data.name: F0
data.value: Hey, [customer first name]. Sorry to hear you’re feeling frustrated. We’re happy to discuss this with you and get a little more information. Please text your name and the word FACEBOOK to 704-313-1818.

data.name: F1
data.value: Hello, thanks for texting us. We’ll be with you as soon as we can to discuss your experience.

data.name: F2
data.value: Thanks for texting us. We close at 8 p.m. ET tonight and open at 8 a.m. ET.

data.name: F3
data.value: If we can’t get to you before we close, we’ll be in touch tomorrow as soon as possible.

data.name: F4
data.value: Thanks for texting us. We close at 7 p.m. ET tonight and open at 8 a.m. ET.

data.name: F5
data.value: If we can’t get to you before we close, we’ll be in touch tomorrow as soon as possible.

data.name: F6
data.value: Hello, thanks for texting us. We’re currently closed until 8 a.m. ET, but we’ll be in touch as soon as possible.

data.name: G1
data.value: Hi. I'm Milo, your automated assistant. I'll get you to the right person as soon as possible.

data.name: G10
data.value: Don't mention it — I'm happy to help. Our last conversation timed out, but I'm still here to help. A) Main menu B) Speak to an associate C) Repeat last question

data.name: G11
data.value: Hey, it’s Milo. I’m sorry your issue wasn’t resolved. Is there anything else I can do? A) Main menu B) Speak to an associate C) Close conversation

data.name: G12
data.value: I’m sorry I wasn’t able to help out more. I’m happy to try again, if you like. A) Main menu B) Speak to an associate C) Repeat last question

data.name: G2
data.value: Hi. I'm Milo, your automated assistant.

data.name: G3
data.value: Hi. I'm Milo, your automated assistant. For your protection, please don't share credit card or security code information.

data.name: G4
data.value: Hi! I'm Milo, your automated assistant. Looks like you sent a photo — thanks. I'm happy to help. I just need a little more information first. For your protection, please don't share credit card or security code information via chat.

data.name: G5
data.value: Nice to see you again. It's Milo. Our earlier chat with the associate timed out, but I'll do my best to still help. A) Main menu B) Speak to an associate

data.name: G6
data.value: Nice to see you again. It's Milo. Our last chat with the associate timed out, but I'll do my best to still help. A) Main menu B) Speak to an associate

data.name: G7
data.value: Hey, welcome back. Milo, here. Our earlier conversation timed out, but I'm still here to help. A) Main menu B) Speak to an associate C) Repeat last question

data.name: G8
data.value: Hey, welcome back. Milo, here. Our last conversation timed out, but I'm still here to help. A) Main menu B) Speak to an associate C) Repeat last question

data.name: G9
data.value: Hey, you’re welcome. By the way, it's Milo. Our earlier chat with the associate timed out. How can I help? A) Main menu B) Speak to an associate

data.name: H1
data.value: OK, got it. Just so you know, we close at 8 p.m. ET tonight and reopen at 8 a.m. ET.

data.value: If we can’t get to you before we close, we’ll be in touch tomorrow as soon as possible.

data.name: H11

data.value: Just so you know, we close at 9 p.m. ET tonight and open at 8 a.m. ET.

data.name: H13
data.value: Thanks. We’re closed but open at 8 a.m. ET. Your message is important, and we’ll be in touch ASAP. Until then, I’d like to get a few repair/warranty details.

data.value: We’re closed but open at 8 a.m. ET. Your message is important, and we’ll be in touch ASAP. Until then, I’d like to get a few details on the repair/warranty.

data.name: H14

data.name: H15

data.name: H16
data.value: Thanks. We’re closed but open at 8 a.m. ET. Your message is important, and we’ll be in touch ASAP. Until then, I’d like to get a few quick details from you.

data.value: Would you like to keep chatting? A) Yes B) No

data.name: I2

data.name: M1
data.value: How can I help you? You can reply with: A) Store info B) Lowe's credit card C) Repair/warranty D) Order status E) Something else

data.name: M2
data.value: What can I look into for you? A) Store info B) Lowe's credit card C) Repair/warranty D) Order status E) Something else

data.value: Do you want to check the status of invoice #: XXXXXX? A) Yes B) No

data.name: O7
data.value: Do you want to check the status of P.O. #: XXXXXX? A) Yes B) No

data.name: O8
data.value: OK, if you have the order or invoice number, send it to me. If not, just say NO and I can still help.

data.name: O9
data.value: Do you have questions about another order? A) Yes B) No

data.name: R1
data.value: Which type of product needs a repair or warranty? A) Major appliance B) Outdoor power equipment C) Other product

data.name: R2
data.value: What's the model or serial number? This is usually located on the inside door/frame or near the control panel.

data.name: R3
data.value: Last question: When did you purchase your appliance? The date is on your receipt or order email. If you're not sure, we can work with an estimate.

data.name: S1
data.value: Thanks. Now, what would you like to know more about? A) Store hours B) In-stock items C) Something else

data.name: S2
data.value: What's the product name or item number you're looking for?

data.name: Submit
data.value: Submit

data.name: U1
data.value: I'm sorry. I didn't get that. What would you like to do next? A) Repeat the question B) Main menu C) Speak to an associate

data.name: U2
data.value: I’m not sure I understand. Help me by replying with: A) Repeat the question B) Main menu C) Speak to an associate

data.name: U3
data.value: Hmm... I still didn't understand. I'm going to pass this information along to an associate so they can help you. We'll be in touch ASAP.

data.name: U4
data.value: I think an associate can better help you from here, so I'm going to pass along your info. We're closed now but open at 8 a.m. ET and will be in touch ASAP.

data.name: Y1
data.value: Don't mention it — I'm happy to help.

data.name: Y2
data.value: You're welcome — see you next time.

data.name: Yes
